About 14 Ware St Unit 44

One bedroom condominium home offers you the perfect balance of urban life combined with the ultimate convenience of Harvard Square. Situated on the TOP floor of a classic brick ELEVATOR building just one block from Harvard Yard, this residence boasts a spacious living and dining area with fresh paint and sun dabbled hardwood floors. The generously sized bedroom features ample closet space and attractive views of a hidden garden courtyard. This wonderful unit comes with off-street PARKING and an amazing location about .4 miles to Red Line public transportation. Shopping, restaurants, and entertainment are almost at your doorstep. Low HOA fees include heat & hot water. Welcome home to 14 Ware Street!
